data.name: san Zoolin
data.detailed_description:
San Zoolin


San Zoolin used to be a thriving tourist island. The beach, the hiking tracks, the caves and colorful town made San Zoolin the perfect holiday destination. But with time the island got a reputation of being unpleasant and shabby. Things were falling apart, were badly organised or unpredictable. And worst of all the islanders personalities were off-putting to put it mildly.

So the island was slowly forgotten. Until the town physician, Dr Otto Otter, had enough. He finally decided to do something about the islanders bad characters and put an ad in for a psychologist in the big city paper.

That's where you come in! Dr Kirk Kitty-Cat. A young Psychologist ready for a big life change. You decide to take the job and get on the ferry to San Zoolin.

As you arrive, Dr Otter explains that the island is in worse shape than you thought. In fact, unless the next holiday season goes well, the whole island will go bankrupt.

That means you have 6 months to earn the trust of the islanders and get them into therapy!



Key Features

⦁ Choose your own way of conducting therapy with the animals, and learn different things about them depending on how you play.
⦁ Get to know diverse animal characters and listen to their life stories
⦁ Explore the island the way you want. Find your own paths and discover new locations.
⦁ Play diverse mini games as a way of getting closer to the other islanders
⦁ Collect small items in your wallet inventory and keep notes about everyone in your notebook

data.short_description: San Zoolin is a beautiful latin island full of mysteries and colorful characters. You get to explore the inner lives of these characters in depth, as well as the beautiful world around them as the new island therapist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
